program: Master of Science in Aeronautics or Space Engineering (MS)

sections.text: Caltech’s aerospace graduate programs provide intense education in the foundations of aeronautical and space sciences with emphasis on analytical, computational, and experimental methods.

items: MS degree available in Aeronautics or Space Engineering
Programs follow Institute master’s requirements and option regulations
sections.text: The Institute offers MS degrees in Aeronautics and Space Engineering; degree progress follows Caltech’s master’s policies and option‑specific rules.
